alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fentress; Overton; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:42PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Overton, Cumberland, Van Buren, southeastern Warren, White, eastern Putnam and southern Fentress Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Livingston to near Spencer. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crossville, Sparta, Spencer, Fairfield Glade, Monterey, Crab Orchard, Pleasant Hill, Doyle, Grimsley, Cumberland Mountain State Park, Slate Springs, Virgin Falls State Natural Area, Rickman, Lake Tansi, Fall Creek Falls State Park, Indian Rock Lake, Clarkrange and Crawford. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 291 and 329. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cumberland; Fentress; Overton; Putnam; Van Buren; Warren; White
